title.narrative: Management of New POPs in the WEEE Recycling Stream and Implementation of PCB Management Programs for Electric Cooperatives

description.narrative: ..The project is formulated based on the priorities in the updated National Implementation Plan (NIP) of the Philippines. It involves management of new POPs in the WEEE Recycling stream and implementation of PCB Management Programs for Electric Cooperatives for submission to the GEF-6 cycle. Project Duration: 18 months PPG, 5 years FSP implementation. The project aims to introduce environmentally sound management of e-wastes to reduce new POPs release reduction from recycling stream and to assist in the implementation of the PCB management programs for electric cooperatives. The proposed project has 4 main components: (i) Management of WEE; (ii) Environmentally-sound Management of PCB contaminated equipment, PCB wastes and stockpiles from electric cooperatives; (iii) Institutional strengthening, capacity building and awareness raising and (iv) Monitoring and Evaluation.
